name: Iai (itch)
description:
Iai - a game where you only have 1 slash to hit all the units on the screen. Press spacebar to slash. The game has 6 zones, and loops back to the first increasing your score/speed multiplier.

Please play in full screen as some UI elements have artifacts at small resolutions in this build.

Borrowed assets:

https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/532941
Katana model
https://www.reddit.com/r/gamedev/comments/c9ff0d/ive_made_150_free_lowpoly_natur...
Various models
https://github.com/DavidArayan/ezy-slice
Mesh cut framework
https://www.zapsplat.com
sword sound

Music: Steven Melin
